fileTypeList.description:
List of data that make up the MIME type of the files to be converted.
If you don't need a specific type, you should remove the 'fileTypeList' property of your options object.

fileCategory.description:
The type represents the general category into which the data type falls.
For exemple: image.

fileExtension.description:
The subtype identifies the exact kind of data of the specified type the MIME type represents.
For exemple: png.
